body.name: Motion Sensor LED Closet Lights, Under Cabinet Lights, Battery Operated Cabinet Lighting, USB Rechargeable Magnetic Wireless Under Counter Lights for Kitchen, Stairs, Hallway(Type A, 2 Pack)

features: 💡【New Upgrading】Each cabinet light has 30 lamp beads,under cabinet light feature the latest edge-lit and anti-glare technology. The lights under the kitchen cabinets will be softer and brighter than the old direct lights. High-quality LEDs not only save energy, but also protect your eyes from glare

💡【USB Rechargeable and Energy Saving】These LED battery operated lights have built-in rechargeable batteries that are easily recharged via the USB cable (included) which is more convenient than other under cupboard lights

💡【Two Work Modes】On motion sensor lighting, indoor motion sensor lights will automatically turn on when motion is detected within a 9-foot, 120° range (the lights will stay on if a human body is always within the sensing range), and turn off after 30 seconds of no movement. . In the always-on mode, the indoor sensor light can be placed on the desk as a study light or flashlight.

💡【Easy to Install】Each wireless motion sensor closet light has magnets on both sides of the back that can stick to any ironwork, or you can use the included tape and snaps to stick it where you want, here's what to note : If two closet lights are installed too close together, one of the lights may not light up due to interference. Please do not install them side by side

💡【Wide Application】Motion activated light is perfect for bedroom, cupboard, kitchen, hallway, workshop, basement, stairwell, storage room and more. We offer a two-year quality guarantee. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact
body.description: Illuminate Your Life If you're tired of rummaging through dark closets, counters, cupboards, pantry and drawers at night, but don't want to increase your electricity bill by turning on expensive lights, then our wireless indoor motion sensor lights can do it for you problem, built-in rechargeable battery and energy saving, let you say goodbye to darkness Please Note If two cabinet lights are installed too close, one of the lights will not light because the other light is on, please do not install them side by sideThe sensor angle is 120°, please do not cover the sensor or the light will not respondThe lamp under the cabinet is not waterproof. Please do not install it in the place with high humidity to avoid faults. More suitable for indoor use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Two Work Modes：On Motion Sensor Lighting, the indoor motion sensor light will automatically turn on when motion is detected within 9 feet, 120° and turn off after 30 seconds of no motion. In the constant light mode, the indoor sensor light can be placed on the desk as a study light, and can also be used as an emergency flashlightTwo Ways to Use：There are magnets on both sides of the back of each wireless motion sensor closet light, you can choose to stick to any iron work, or you can use the included tape and snaps stick where you wantLED Rechargeable Cabinet Light：The induction light has a built-in rechargeable battery, the light is red when charging, and the red light disappears when it is fully charged, it only needs to be charged for 2 hours to be fully charged, the light is bright and not dazzlingWide Range of Applications：This multipurpose cabinet light is perfect for bedrooms, baby rooms, closets, cupboards, hallways, workshops, basements, garages, stairwells, storage rooms and other places

Illuminate Your Life If you're tired of rummaging through dark closets, counters, cupboards, pantry and drawers at night, but don't want to increase your electricity bill by turning on expensive lights, then our wireless indoor motion sensor lights can do it for you problem, built-in rechargeable battery and energy saving, let you say goodbye to darkness Please Note If two cabinet lights are installed too close, one of the lights will not light because the other light is on, please do not install them side by sideThe sensor angle is 120°, please do not cover the sensor or the light will not respondThe lamp under the cabinet is not waterproof. Please do not install it in the place with high humidity to avoid faults. More suitable for indoor use Package: 2x closet lights 2x Buckle 4x double sided tape 1x USB cable 1x User manual

How to use cabinet lights correctly？ Press the switch button once to enter the constant light mode. At this time, the light is always on. You can use it as a night light or a study desk light, or even as an emergency flashlight. Press the cabinet light again, and when the cabinet light flashes, it means the sensing mode. At this time, the light will only light up in a dim environment, and the sensing range is 120° (the lights will stay on if a human body is always within the sensing range). Press the cabinet light a third time to turn it off

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really good
reviews.reviewText: Love these lights. Very bright, and the sensor is extremely sensitive. It picks up motion from very far away. Battery depends on how much it gets turned on but works as intended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Crap. Serious crap.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 4 of these. Had to exchange 3 of them for various reasons — some didn’t work at all, some had a magnet that came off easily due to bad adhesion. All replacements work now (with a couple of magnet issues), but the battery lasts only a couple of weeks (after about 20 minutes of total lighting). These are used in Bedroom clothes closets so it’s nota lot of use. Has high hopes but look elsewhere if you want something to work properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lights, using on basement staircase.
reviews.reviewText: Very good lighting on a dark staircase. You do have to charge them quite frequently. Mostly need to be charged every other day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a real good deal
reviews.reviewText: They don’t really brighten up our large area but for small closets medium size closets it’s sufficient. If you have them in the closet for a time and don’t open the closet door much, it will last for quite a while without having a charge. Of course if you are in an area like I have mine in the kitchen underneath their cabinets and they go on and off at night when I’m walking around. You will have to charge them a little more often maybe every four days five days. Easy to install great sticking material 3M. They have two settings stay on and where you can have a motion detection. I am now finished, and I will say it was well worth it, and I would buy them again when I did actually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The light is bright and sensors work great. But the battery power is horrible. Last maybe 2 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Short battery life
reviews.reviewText: I really want to love these. They’re super easy to install, the light is the perfect brightness, and the motion detection is very convenient. But the battery life is very very short. I bought these because our kitchen it fairly dark so they are used often. I have to plug them in once a day to recharge. The one, I just keep plugged in all the time for convenience and reliability. Which makes the light noticeable with a cord hanging down. Look for something with a longer battery life. You’ll be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can put them anywhere
reviews.reviewText: Small and bright. Can be installed anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great for under my upper cabinets!
